org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers

Class BaseCudnnHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.BaseCudnnHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CudnnBatchNormalizationHelper, CudnnConvolutionHelper, CudnnDropoutHelper, CudnnLocalResponseNormalizationHelper, CudnnLSTMHelper, CudnnSubsamplingHelper

    public abstract class BaseCudnnHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Functionality shared by all cuDNN-based helpers.

      • adaptForTensorDescr

        protected static int[] adaptForTensorDescr(int[] shapeOrStrides)
        From CuDNN documentation - "Tensors are restricted to having at least 4 dimensions... When working with lower dimensional data, it is recommended that the user create a 4Dtensor, and set the size along unused dimensions to 1." This method implements that - basically appends 1s to the end (shape or stride) to make it length 4, or leaves it unmodified if the length is already 4 or more. This method can be used for both shape and strides
        Parameters:
        shapeOrStrides -
        Returns:
